full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS MDOS GLUD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA MDOS GLUD 'BUL TSUL ZHES PA 'DI NI BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA'I SKU GZHUGS GRVA TSANG PHAN BDE GSANG SNGAGS GLING GI BLO RIGS DANG LDAN PA DIM CHI AER TE NI TZAS SAN SKAL BZANG DGE LEGS DANG, JANG JONG CHEN WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS GSO RTZIS KYI BLO RIG PAS BRGYAN PA DI CHI BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA NAN TAN CHEN POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR KHRAL DU, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED RJE DZA YA PAndI TA'I MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA, NYON MONGS KYI THAN DU GYUR BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON ZHES BGYIS PAS SBYAR BA DE YIS GNAS SKABS DANG MTHAR THUG GI 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHOD KUN SEL ZHING RGYAL BA'I GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO,, ,,)
